text: Horsfieldia flocculosa is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Chua, L.S.L. 1998. Horsfieldia flocculosa. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Horsfieldia flocculosa
